cards.front: How do you access request data?

How do you register a Blueprint?
How do you set up Flask-SQLAlchemy?
cards.back:
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy

db = SQLAlchemy(app)

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True)

cards.front: How do you create a WTForms form in Flask?
cards.back:
from flask_wtf import FlaskForm
from wtforms import StringField, SubmitField
from wtforms.validators import DataRequired

class ContactForm(FlaskForm):
    name = StringField('Name', validators=[DataRequired()])
    submit = SubmitField('Submit')

cards.front: How do you use Flask sessions?
cards.back:
from flask import session

# Set session data
session['username'] = 'john'

# Get session data
username = session.get('username')

# Don't forget to set secret key!
app.secret_key = 'your-secret-key'
